snippet: With the addition of Vanderbilt Coach James Franklin and five N.F.L. assistants, the list of candidates for Washington’s head coaching job has at least 11 names.
abstract: NFL Roundup; Washington Redskins, one of five teams seeking a head coach, is setting up an interview with Vanderbilt Coach James Franklin, bringing the total of known candidates to 11, enough to field a team; other news noted.
lead_paragraph: With the addition of Vanderbilt Coach James Franklin and five N.F.L. assistants, the list of candidates for Washington’s head coaching job has at least 11 names.

headline.print_headline: Redskins’ Candidates Could Almost Take the Field
headline.main: Redskins’ Candidates Could Almost Take the Field
